title: Consolidated Statements of Earnings - USD ($)shares in Millions, $ in Millions

null.label: Revenue
null.definition: Amount, including tax collected from customer, of revenue from satisfaction of performance obligation by transferring promised good or service to customer. Tax collected from customer is tax assessed by governmental authority that is both imposed on and concurrent with specific revenue-producing transaction, including, but not limited to, sales, use, value-added and excise.

null.label: Cost of sales
null.definition: The aggregate costs related to goods produced and sold and services rendered by an entity during the reporting period. This excludes costs incurred during the reporting period related to financial services rendered and other revenue generating activities.

null.label: Gross profit
null.definition: Aggregate revenue less cost of goods and services sold or operating expenses directly attributable to the revenue generation activity.

null.label: Selling, general and administrative expenses
null.definition: The aggregate total costs related to selling a firm's product and services, as well as all other general and administrative expenses. Direct selling expenses (for example, credit, warranty, and advertising) are expenses that can be directly linked to the sale of specific products. Indirect selling expenses are expenses that cannot be directly linked to the sale of specific products, for example telephone expenses, Internet, and postal charges. General and administrative expenses include salaries of non-sales personnel, rent, utilities, communication, etc.

null.label: Restructuring charges
null.definition: Amount of expenses associated with exit or disposal activities pursuant to an authorized plan. Excludes expenses related to a discontinued operation or an asset retirement obligation.

null.label: Operating income
null.definition: The net result for the period of deducting operating expenses from operating revenues.

Other income (expense):.label: Gain on sale of investments
Other income (expense):.definition: The difference between the carrying value and the sale price of equity securities, not separately or otherwise categorized as trading or available-for-sale. This element includes investments in which the entity holds a small ownership stake (generally, less than 20% of the shares outstanding) and cannot exert significant influence.

Other income (expense):.label: Investment income and other
Other income (expense):.definition: Amount after accretion (amortization) of discount (premium), and investment expense, of interest income and dividend income on nonoperating securities.

Other income (expense):.label: Interest expense
Other income (expense):.definition: Amount of the cost of borrowed funds accounted for as interest expense.

Other income (expense):.label: Earnings from continuing operations before income tax expense
Other income (expense):.definition: Amount of income (loss) from continuing operations before deduction of income tax expense (benefit) and income (loss) attributable to noncontrolling interest, and addition of income (loss) from equity method investments.

Other income (expense):.label: Income tax expense
Other income (expense):.definition: Amount of current income tax expense (benefit) and deferred income tax expense (benefit) pertaining to continuing operations.

Other income (expense):.label: Net earnings from continuing operations
Other income (expense):.definition: Amount after tax of income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to the parent.

Other income (expense):.label: Gain from discontinued operations, net of $0 tax expense
Other income (expense):.definition: Amount after tax of income (loss) from a discontinued operation attributable to the parent. Includes, but is not limited to, the income (loss) from operations during the phase-out period, gain (loss) on disposal, gain (loss) for reversal of write-down (write-down) to fair value, less cost to sell, and adjustments to a prior period gain (loss) on disposal.

Other income (expense):.label: Net earnings
Other income (expense):.definition: The portion of profit or loss for the period, net of income taxes, which is attributable to the parent.

Other income (expense):.label: Basic earnings per share
Other income (expense):.definition: The amount of net income (loss) for the period per each share of common stock or unit outstanding during the reporting period.

Other income (expense):.label: Diluted earnings per share
Other income (expense):.definition: The amount of net income (loss) for the period available to each share of common stock or common unit outstanding during the reporting period and to each share or unit that would have been outstanding assuming the issuance of common shares or units for all dilutive potential common shares or units outstanding during the reporting period.

Other income (expense):.label: Basic
Other income (expense):.definition: Number of [basic] shares or units, after adjustment for contingently issuable shares or units and other shares or units not deemed outstanding, determined by relating the portion of time within a reporting period that common shares or units have been outstanding to the total time in that period.

Other income (expense):.label: Diluted
Other income (expense):.definition: The average number of shares or units issued and outstanding that are used in calculating diluted EPS or earnings per unit (EPU), determined based on the timing of issuance of shares or units in the period.
